settings.title: Our Story
settings.content: On a skiing trip a few years ago a friend injured himself so Paul, our CEO, spent the rest of the trip skiing alone listening to music. When he wanted to change his playlist, adjust the volume or accept a phone call Paul had to stop, take a glove off and retrieve his phone from a pocket, before replacing everything to carry on. He had a similar experience running, cycling and training in his local gym. There was no existing wearable device or phone accessory that solved this problem, until now.
"At ArcX, our mission is to provide the best, most seamless user experience to every athlete in the world, through our innovative and revolutionary wearable technology"

settings.text: Here's how we've dedicated the last two years of our lives to get to this stage:

settings.content: We are a team of engineers, designers, athletes and military veterans. Founded in 2019 and headquartered in London, UK with offices in St Petersburg, USA.

We are a team of engineers, designers, athletes and military veterans. Together, we have over 80 years experience creating products, managing projects and delivering results.  We've spent the last three years designing, building, testing and improving the ArcX aesthetics, software and hardware to deliver a first of its kind product.

settings.title: Paul Blair CEO & Founder
settings.content: Paul is a decorated military leader with five years corporate experience as the Innovation and Marketing director for a global manufacturing company. He appeared on the UK version of Dragons’ Den when he pitched Safestix, a new range of dog toys. Despite being turned down these products have gone on to generate over $70M in sales.

settings.title: Kumar Bala CTO & Co-founder
settings.content: Kuamr worked for several years at Intel and Texas Instruments as an embedded software engineer. He is a serial entrepreneur and deep tech consultant with over 20 years experience in wearables and medical devices.
The ArcX smart ring - seamless control, endless possibilities. Control your phone, wireless speaker, sports camera or any Bluetooth device, hands free, on the move, even when wearing gloves.
